tswitem.name: Signet of Martyr's Miracle
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Martyr's Miracle
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you die, you create a healing area near where you died which lasts 10 seconds. Allies standing in the area are healed for %0.0f every second. The amount healed increases with your heal rating. This Signet can be attached to Major Talismans.
